subject: Baseball
Bankruptcies
Ponzi and Pyramid Schemes
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz on Monday settled the lawsuit brought against them by Irving H. Picard, the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, for $162 million.
snippet: Fred Wilpon and Saul Katz on Monday settled the lawsuit brought against them by Irving H. Picard, the trustee for the victims of Bernard L. Madoff’s fraud, for $162 million.
